mapper.insert: insert into t_book_api ( title, author, pubDate, description, isbn, isbn13, itemId, priceStandard , cover, categoryId, publisher, adult, customerReviewRank, bestRank) values (#{title}, #{author}, #{pubDate}, #{description}, #{isbn}, #{isbn13}, #{itemId}, #{priceStandard}, #{cover}, #{categoryId}, #{publisher}, #{adult}, #{customerReviewRank}, #{bestRank})
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) AS result FROM t_book_api WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
